title.rendered: Robert Pattinson and Kristen Stewart: Kissing on Camera!

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

If you thought still images of Robert Pattinson and Kristen Stewart making out on the streets of Brazil were hot, sit back and prepare a cold shower…

A video camera has captured this pair going at it in one of the more beloved Breaking Dawn scenes, as Edward and Bella honeymoon on the beach and can’t keep their hands or lips off one another.

There’s no sound in the 90-second clip, so feel free to provide your own. We have a feeling many Twihards won’t be able to keep their screams in anyway. Enjoy…
